name: Ace Attorney: Judgement Seekers
summary: After the trial of Vera Misham, Apollo begins to think about the meaning of being a lawyer. However, life continues, and since this is AA, crazy cases keep happening, and he gets dragged into a complex net of mysteries and conspiracies that have more to do with him than he might have imagined. Can he find the answers he searches for during those trials, or will he go down? One thing is certain, he doesn't fight alone!
